articles.author: Mike Harrington News Sports Reporter
articles.title: In wake of Ilya Lyubushkin's historic OT goal, Sabres can move into playoff spot with regulation win over Panthers - Buffalo News
articles.description: A regulation win for the Sabres would give them 64 points and move them into a tie with both Florida and Detroit while allowing them to jump over idle Pittsburgh.
articles.content:
TAMPA  Ilya Lyubushkin, meet Jason Pominville. Buffalo Sabres, maybe meet a spot in the playoffs.
The Sabres had a wild night here Thursday with their 6-5 overtime win over the Tampa Bay Lightning b… [+3633 chars]
